tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Dr. Cantens is a true Philosophy Professor. He doesn\'t give multiple choice or matching assignments; every assignment requires excellent writing with clear reference to the text, his lectures and outside sources if possible. He spells it all out in his syllabus. Amazingly, he reads every paper from every student and gives helpful feedback.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  INSPIRATIONAL  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Dr. Cantens is a great professor to take a class with at Moravian College. He truly listens to you when you speak. His classes are either writing intensive or a mix of both from my experience after taking 3 courses with him. Pay attention to his lecture in class, and fully understand the topic you are having a test or paper on, and you will do fine

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Take classes with Cantens - whether or not you\'re a philosophy major. He\'s an awesome professor, never dull and is super into philosophy - which makes the material even more interesting

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Cantens is an awesome guy. He\'s quirky and his classes are always interesting. He really has a true passion for philosophy and is willing to help you however he can!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Cantens is one of the most amazing profs I have ever had! Super intelligent, passionate, and never dull. Take EVERY class he offers if you can - you won\'t regret it!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He\'s a cool guy. He\'s a tough grader, but he always lets you resubmit a paper for a better grade.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Cantens grades hard, but he gives so many opportunities to do well. As long as you listen, read his powerpoints, come to him with questions, and do your work, you should be fine. Remember to talk with him, because it will definitely help!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Mr. Cantens seems to enjoy philosophy, but never manages to transfer his passion to any students. One example that sticks out in my mind: he was telling the class we should all be philosophy majors, and when a student asked what the use of said major was, Cantens stammered, provided no intelligible answer, and went back to his lecture.
